restriction.title: Notification
restriction.description: Notification settings

restriction.title: Good read duration
restriction.description: Duration of each notification on a successful read (in msec). Valid values in range of 20-500.

restriction.title: Good read interval
restriction.description: Delay between notifications on a successful read (in msec). Valid values in range of 20-500.

restriction.title: Good read number
restriction.description: Number of notifications produced on a successful read. Valid values in range of 1-4.

restriction.title: Enable display notification
restriction.description: Pop up a toast message on successful read

restriction.title: Good read audio mode
restriction.description: Selects the scanner audio notification mode

restriction.title: Default good read audio file selection
restriction.description: File used for the audio notification on a successful read chosen from list of Factory audio tones

restriction.title: Custom good read audio file path
restriction.description: Path to a custom audio file used for the audio notification on a successful read. If a custom path is not specified, the default audio file will be used.

restriction.title: Good read audio volume
restriction.description: Volume of the audio notification on a successful read. Valid values in range of 0-100.

restriction.title: Good Read
restriction.description: Good read settings

restriction.title: Enable good read
restriction.description: Automatic good read when the scan is successful

restriction.title: Enable Green Spot
restriction.description: Green spot with good read

restriction.title: Enable good read LED
restriction.description: Green LED with good read

restriction.title: Enable vibrator
restriction.description: Vibrate when the scan is successful

restriction.title: Formatting
restriction.description: Formatting Settings

restriction.title: Label prefix
restriction.description: A string of Unicode characters sent immediately before the symbology identifier. Label prefix may contain printable and non-printable characters. Use the ASCII character symbol surrounded by square brackets to represent non-printable characters. E.g. [ESC] is the ASCII character symbol representing the ESCAPE non-printable. An ASCII table may be found at the following address: www.asciitable.com

restriction.title: Label suffix
restriction.description: A string of Unicode characters sent after the final character in the scanned data. Label suffix may contain printable and non-printable characters. Use the ASCII character symbol surrounded by square brackets to represent non-printable characters. E.g. [LF] is the ASCII character symbol representing the LINE FEED non-printable. An ASCII table may be found at the following address: www.asciitable.com

restriction.title: Group Separator Replacement
restriction.description: A string of Unicode characters that replaces each occurrence of GS in the scanned data. Group Separator Replacement string may contain printable and non-printable characters. Use the ASCII character symbol surrounded by square brackets to represent non-printable characters. E.g. [BS][TAB] is a group separator sequence consisting of two non-printable characters. An ASCII table may be found at the following address: www.asciitable.com

restriction.title: Remove non-printable characters
restriction.description: Removes all non-printable characters from the scanned data. The length check for each symbology is evaluated before any characters are removed. Characters in the code ID, prefix, suffix, and separator won't be removed.

restriction.title: Send Code ID
restriction.description: Select the symbology identifier to be transmitted along with the scanned data

restriction.title: Scanner Options
restriction.description: Scanner Options Settings

restriction.title: Scanner Options
restriction.description: Scanner Options Settings

restriction.title: Enable picklist
restriction.description: Limits reading to targeted selection

restriction.title: Enable illumination
restriction.description: Enables barcode illumination when capturing frames

restriction.title: Illumination type
restriction.description: Selects the scanner illuminator to be used for decoding

restriction.title: Enable aim
restriction.description: Enables aim projection when capturing frames

restriction.title: Display mode
restriction.description: Barcode illumination management for capturing frames from displays or reflective surfaces. The possible configurations are- Disabled: illuminator always enabled; Enabled: illuminator adjusted according to reflection in the previous acquired frames

restriction.title: Image Capture Profile
restriction.description: Selects the scanner image capture profile

restriction.title: Custom image capture profile
restriction.description: Frame brightness of custom image capture profile. Valid values in range of 0-255.

restriction.title: Target mode
restriction.description: Selects the scanner target beam mode

restriction.title: Target timeout
restriction.description: Time the target beam is on before scanner attempts to read (in seconds)

restriction.title: Release scan timeout
restriction.description: Maximum time the scanner is on after trigger release when using Release Scan target beam mode (in seconds)

restriction.title: Decode timeout
restriction.description: Maximum time the scanner remains on without reading a barcode (in seconds)

restriction.title: Multi Scan
restriction.description: Multi Scan Settings

restriction.title: Enable multi scan
restriction.description: Capture multiple labels sequentially

restriction.title: Number of required labels
restriction.description: The number of required labels to be read before automatically ending a good read transaction. The decoding session is ended successfully and all the collected labels are returned together, only if the label count is reached. Number of labels must be between 2 and 10.

restriction.title: Enable single notification
restriction.description: Defines whether to notify each successfully read label during Multi Scan operation

restriction.title: Wedge
restriction.description: Wedge

restriction.title: Keyboard wedge
restriction.description: Keyboard wedge Settings

restriction.title: Enable keyboard wedge
restriction.description: The captured data will be sent to the foreground application in the form of key events

restriction.title: Enable keyboard wedge only on focus
restriction.description: Send captured data in the form of key events only to the current text area with active keyboard input

restriction.title: Keyboard wedge input mode
restriction.description: Input mode for keyboard wedge

restriction.title: Intent wedge
restriction.description: Intent wedge Settings

restriction.title: Enable intent wedge
restriction.description: The captured data will be sent to an application in the form of an implicit intent

restriction.title: Intent delivery mode
restriction.description: Delivery mode for intent wedge

restriction.title: Intent action
restriction.description: Set the general action to be performed

restriction.title: Intent category
restriction.description: Set the intent category

restriction.title: Intent extra barcode string
restriction.description: Set key corresponding to extra data

restriction.title: Intent extra barcode type
restriction.description: Set an explicit MIME data type

restriction.title: Intent extra barcode data
restriction.description: Set the data this intent is operating on

restriction.title: Web wedge
restriction.description: Web wedge Settings

restriction.title: Enable web wedge
restriction.description: The captured data will be sent to the Internet browsing application, in the form of a valid URL

restriction.description: Settings for scanner symbologies
